mapper.select: select level, articleNO, parentNO, LPAD(' ', 4*(LEVEL-1)) || title title, content, writeDate, imageFileName, id from board start with parentNO=0 connect by prior articleNO=parentNO order siblings by articleNO desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T1.*, ROWNUM AS SEQ, FLOOR((ROWNUM-1)/3+1) AS PAGE, -- 한 페이지에 3행씩 보여주는 경우 COUNT(*) OVER() AS TTCNT FROM -- 테이블에 저장된 총 라인(행) 수 - ( select LEVEL, articleNO,parentNO, LPAD(' ', 4*(LEVEL-1)) || title title,content,writeDate,imageFileName,id from board START WITH parentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO=parentNO order siblings by articleNO desc ) T1 ) WHERE PAGE = #{pageNo}

select level,articleNO,parentNO,LPAD(' ', 4*(LEVEL-1)) || title title,content,writeDate,imageFileName,id from ( SELECT * FROM board ORDER BY articleNO DESC )WHERE ROWNUM <= 3 start with parentNO=0 connect by prior articleNO=parentNO order siblings by articleNO desc
